articles.author: Jon Shelton
articles.title: EU delays signing Mercosur free trade deal, again - DW
articles.description: EU leaders have once again delayed signing a comprehensive trade deal with South America. Now 25 years in the making, lawmakers expect an agreement to be signed in January.
articles.content: EU leaders at a Brussels summit decided on Thursday to postpone the signing of a trade deal with four Mercosur countries until January. That means that despite 25 years of negotiations, the sides are… [+2891 chars]

articles.author: Adam Wagner
articles.title: Trump will revisit a North Carolina town, now the focus of a newly redrawn congressional district - NPR
articles.description: While he is directly appealing to Americans that the economy is improving, President Trump will visit a congressional district Republicans are eyeing in their attempts to keep control the U.S. House.
articles.content:
ROCKY MOUNT, N.C. President Trump will visit Rocky Mount, N.C., on Friday, capping off a week in which his administration has attempted to reassure Americans 
that the nation's economy is improving.… [+5641 chars]
